claimWin(uint256).details: this function can only be called by a worker, user never calls it directly

params._index: the index of the instance of pos you want to interact with

returns._0: bool if user is eligible to produce next block
returns._1: address of user that was chosen to build the block
returns._2: current prize paid by the network for that block
returns._3: percentage of prize that goes to the user

params._desiredDrawTimeInterval: how often we want to elect a winner
params._difficultyAdjustmentParameter: how quickly the difficulty gets updated according to the difference between time passed and desired draw time interval.
params._prizeManagerAddress: address containing the tokens that will be distributed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getState(uint256,address).notice: Get state of a particular instance
